title: Trendtroducing… by DJ Shadow 6/2: Coach K, Danny Ainge, Proud Boys/Oathkeepers, Andrew Giuliani
itunes:title: Trendtroducing… by DJ Shadow 6/2: Coach K, Danny Ainge, Proud Boys/Oathkeepers, Andrew Giuliani
description:
On this edition of Trendtroducing… by DJ Shadow Jack and Miles discuss Coach K retiring, Danny Ainge also retiring, the heat coming down on far-right extremism, and Andrew Giuliani's first campaign faux pas.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
